fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Take full control over the Oni every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- The Nogitsune has a powerful grasp over supernatural entities. If this rolls you must roll an Oni.
- If the Nogitsune dies the Oni will be released and no longer have the Fox win-con.
- Can not control the Oni and perform the factional kill the same night.
